Treatments

Eyebrow Care

Shaping, Tints & More

The B&B Studio Complete Eyebrow Experience - £45

This is for anyone who is in search of a complete wow eyebrow treatment, using symmetry and face mapping for uneven brow shape, or creating precision, your brows will appear more fuller, fluffier and sculpted. Includes brow lamination,a shape, tidy and tint. The results last up to 6 weeks

Eyebrow Tint - £12

Enhances and darken the brows

Brow Lamination - £40

Existing brows are lifted and manipulated into a new position, appearing fluffy and full- staying in place for up to 6 weeks, also includes a tint and tidy.

Microblading - £170

An extreme game changer in the world of eyebrows! This semi permanent cosmetic procedure gives more longer lasting results. It may be selected to create a new whole new set of brows or to enhance the natural existing shape. Creating realistic hair strokes.,gaps or spaces in the brows are filled in using high quality pigment placed in the dermal area of the skin. The treatment can take 2-3 hours with a top up appointment required after 8 weeks of the initial appointment to achieve the best results. A full detailed consultation & patch test is required prior to the treatment.
